title: Open Closed Eyes in Photo
playgroundDescription: Opening closed eyes in a photo is simple with AI. The tool analyzes your image, recreates natural-looking eyes, and blends them seamlessly, allowing you to fix blinks or unclear eye details.

metadata.title: Open Closed Eyes in Photo with AI for Free
metadata.description: Use Our AI tool to open closed eyes in photo and fix blinking or imperfect shots with natural-looking results. Restore portraits, selfies, and group pictures quickly and accurately.

faqs.heading: FAQs About Opening Closed Eyes in Photos

questions.question: How does the AI open closed eyes in a photo?
questions.answer: Remix AI analyzes the face, reconstructs natural-looking eyes based on facial features, and blends them seamlessly into the image for a realistic result.

questions.question: Will the opened eyes look natural?
questions.answer: Yes. Our AI is designed to match skin tone, lighting, and facial structure so the opened eyes appear natural and consistent with the original photo.

questions.question: Can I use this tool if both eyes are closed?
questions.answer: Absolutely. The AI can recreate one or both eyes, even if the original image shows fully closed eyes.

questions.question: Does it change the rest of the face?
questions.answer: No. Only the eye area is adjusted while the rest of the face and background remain untouched.

questions.question: Is this tool free to use?
questions.answer: Yes. You can open closed eyes in your photos at no cost and generate as many results as you need. Remix AI also offers new users free credits upon signup to try image effects.

images.alt: Open Closed Eyes in Photo With AI

howItWorks.heading: How Open Closed Eyes in Photo Works?
howItWorks.description: Follow these simple steps to automatically open closed eyes in your photos.

steps.title: Upload Photo
bulletPoints: Choose a clear, well-lit image with the face fully visible and upload it to the tool.

steps.title: Apply the Eye-Opening Effect
bulletPoints: Let the AI analyze the face and reconstruct natural-looking eyes; adjust any fine-tune settings such as position, size, or intensity.

steps.title: Review & Save
bulletPoints: Preview the realistic result, make minor edits if needed, then save or share the finished image.
